book.synopsis: Painfully shy and introverted, Lynne Henry, a talented musician, anonymously enters a songwriting contest sponsored by her secret love, Guy Chesney, and his band, and it is up to Elizabeth to help Lynne share her musical gifts
book.title_long: ALONE IN THE CROWD (Sweet Valley High, 28)
